events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan application to cover unexpected medical expenses and some outstanding debts.
Loan application has been categorized under Personal Loan as the applicant has specified medical and debt consolidation purposes.
A dedicated loan officer was assigned to assist the applicant throughout the personal loan process for medical and debt repayment needs.
The initial review of the application was completed, verifying the purpose and preliminary eligibility against company guidelines.
Requested medical bills, proof of current income, and statements of outstanding debt to proceed with application evaluation.
Applicant promptly submitted all required medical invoices, income verification documents, and debt statements.
Completed credit check showing a stable credit history, though with some recent fluctuations due to medical payments.
Risk assessment completed; applicant's financial situation considered moderately risky due to recent debts but manageable.
An offer for a 36-month personal loan at an interest rate suited for medical-related expenses was presented to the applicant.
Applicant accepted the terms of the loan offer with satisfaction regarding the repayment plan and interest rate.
Loan approval was granted pending final review of the submitted documents and applicant consent.
Personal loan funds were disbursed successfully to the applicant's designated bank account to cover medical expenses.
Follow-up call conducted to ensure the applicant was satisfied with the loan and had started the repayment process smoothly.
The loan application process was formally closed after successful funding and post-approval follow-up with the applicant.
